mapper.select: select id, remark, name, menus, parent_id as parentId, parent_name as parentName, full_path as fullPath from role where id = #{roleId}
select exists(select 1 from role where name = #{name})

select id as roleId, remark, name, menus, parent_id as parentId, parent_name as parentName from role where full_path = #{fullPath} or full_path like #{fullPathLike}
mapper.insert: insert into role (created_at, updated_at, remark, name, menus, parent_id, parent_name, full_path) values (#{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{remark}, #{name}, #{menus}, #{parentId}, #{parentName}, #{fullPath})
